SidecarUrl.Name: Sidecar WebSocket URL
SidecarUrl.Hint: WebSocket URL of the Magi sidecar server (e.g., ws://127.0.0.1:3300)

SidecarToken.Name: Sidecar Auth Token
SidecarToken.Hint: Authentication token for connecting to the sidecar

EnableVideoCapture.Name: Enable Video Capture
EnableVideoCapture.Hint: Capture the canvas as video and stream to the sidecar for training data
